    Subclasses of WeaponEffect in com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DiceReroller
    An effect that rerolls the weapon's dice and applies the damage twice to the target
    This effect has a 70% probability to apply.
    It is paired with the Nano Dirk
    class 
    HealthAbsorber
    An effect that absorbs health from the target and heals the character holding the weapon
    This effect is has a 66,6% chance to apply but it doesn't consume mana
    It is paired with the Nanite Leech Blade
    class 
    ManaAttackBooster
    An effect that allows the weapon to inflict from 5 to 10 dmg points
    It requires 3 mana points to be used
    It is paired with the Pulse Staff
